Package it.polimi.ingsw.network.server

Class EchoServer

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.network.server.EchoServer
All Implemented Interfaces:
ClientDisconnectionListener
public class EchoServer
extends java.lang.Object
implements ClientDisconnectionListener
This class manages a multi-client TCP socket connection (server side).

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    EchoServer​(int port)  

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void findAMatch​(java.net.Socket client)
    This method searches a free lobby for the new connected client.
    void initializeServer()
    This method initializes a ServerSocket on port.
    void onClientDown​(VirtualView v)
    This method is called when a client connection go down, it provides to remove the lobby where this client was
    void onMatchFinish​(VirtualView v)
    This method is called when the match have to finish.
    void start()
    This method allows server to start to accept a connection from a client and create a thread which manages a specific client connection (the connection is multi-client).

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Constructor Details

    • EchoServer

      public EchoServer​(int port)

  • Method Details

    • start

      public void start()
      This method allows server to start to accept a connection from a client and create a thread which manages a specific client connection (the connection is multi-client). It allows to create a new lobby if existing lobbies are full or the match into them have already started.

    • initializeServer

      public void initializeServer()
      This method initializes a ServerSocket on port.

    • findAMatch

      public void findAMatch​(java.net.Socket client)
      This method searches a free lobby for the new connected client. If there is a free lobby it inserts it in this lobby, otherwise it creates a new one of which this client becomes its creator.
      Parameters:
      client - is the new client's socket.

    • onClientDown

      public void onClientDown​(VirtualView v)
      This method is called when a client connection go down, it provides to remove the lobby where this client was
      Specified by:
      onClientDown in interface ClientDisconnectionListener
      Parameters:
      v - is the virtual view represents a lobby/match

    • onMatchFinish

      public void onMatchFinish​(VirtualView v)
      This method is called when the match have to finish. It provides to visualize a message on the server and to delete the lobby where the match was evolving.
      Specified by:
      onMatchFinish in interface ClientDisconnectionListener
      Parameters:
      v - is the lobby's virtualView
